/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and beige, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. Their uniform color palette is punctuated by occasional red and green accents, adding a touch of vibrancy to the urban landscape. The trees, with their lush green foliage, provide a natural contrast to the man-made structures. In the far distance, the faint outlines of mountains can be seen, adding depth and a sense of grandeur to the scene. The perspective of the image, taken from a high angle, offers a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings, providing a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
